flawed_nl_solution:
The class needs to read 3000 hours in a week because 299 + 1 = <<3000=3000>>3000
The class needs to read 600 hours a day because 3000 / 5 = <<3000/5=600>>600
Each student needs to read 30 hours a day because 600 / 20 = <<600/20=30>>30
#### 30

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
